preHandle(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, Object) - Method in class hac.filters.GameFilter
The handler was meant to handle situation that a player sent an "in game related" rest and the room is not full but because of an error discovered too close to the submission deadline, we decided to disable the filter's functionality.
